addr: 1125 N McCadden Pl Los Angeles, CA 90038
title: Write That Spec' Script Now! - Television Writers Workshop
desc: You?ve taken all the expensive writing classes, you?ve networked and done all the grunt work to get your foot in the door and you?ve fantasized about what your life could be like if you could just get that first big break and start your new career as a writer in television.? Now is the time to stop fantasizing and make those dreams finally become your reality. Every aspiring writer needs that all important spec script at the ready if they are ever going to land representation and/or that first writing job on a scripted TV series. This hands-on course was designed for the sole purpose of helping you achieve that goal. With the help and guidance of Instructor, Mark Alton Brown, you will get the extra push you need to complete a half-hour or hour-long spec script that will be your calling card. ? ? Instructor:  Mark Brown ? Course Meeting Schedule: Wed., Mar. 2, 9, 16, 23, 30 & Apr. 6 Course Meeting Times: 7 - 9:30 pm
